title: How to Make Roselle Juice

steps.headline: Pluck some roselle fruits from your home garden.
steps.description: Alternatively, buy them in your local market.

steps.headline: Peel the calyces.
steps.description: Take out the seeds. Use only the calyces.

steps.headline: Wash the calyces clean with water.
Put calyces, sugar and water in a large pot.
Strain the liquid into a bowl or pitcher.
Serve the roselle juice warm or chilled with ice.

text: Pluck some roselle fruits from your home garden. Alternatively, buy them in your local market. Peel the calyces. Take out the seeds. Use only the calyces. Wash the calyces clean with water.  Put calyces, sugar and water in a large pot. Boil them for 15 to 20 minutes. Strain the liquid into a bowl or pitcher. Discard the calyces. Serve the roselle juice warm or chilled with ice.
